EmailTemplate.name: RS Customer - PreApplication Denial
EmailTemplate.subject: Your BlueWave Solar Loan Pre-Approval Application has been denied
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.FirstName},
Thank you for submitting your pre-approval application to participate in BlueWave's Home Solar Loan Program.
Regretfully, we are unable to pre-approve your application at this time. You will receive an email outlining the official reasons for application denial within 30 days. If you have already received a contract for signature, you will receive notification that the contract has been voided.
You may submit a new solar loan application in the future if your credit profile improves.
We will also reconsider your application with a qualified co-signer. If you would like to add a co-signer to your application, please fill out this form.
If you do submit an application with a co-signer, you will still receive an official credit denial notice within 30 days.
You will receive separate notifications on the status of your co-application.
- All of us here at BlueWave
BlueWave Solar {!Organization.Street} Boston, MA {!Organization.PostalCode}
Questions or concerns about solar? Call us at 844.786.4100 Email us at customercare@bluewavesolar.com
